original_text: “I have said all these things to you to keep you from falling away.
korean_text: 내가 이것을 너희에게 이름은 너희로 실족하지 않게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: I have said all these things to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 이 모든 것들을 말하였다

sentences.original_text: to keep you from falling away
